description: Gets information about a Device Defender audit. Requires permission to access the DescribeAuditTask action.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The ID of the audit whose information you want to get.

nested_items.name: taskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the audit: one of 'IN_PROGRESS', 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED', or 'CANCELED'.

nested_items.name: taskType
nested_items.description: The type of audit: 'ON_DEMAND_AUDIT_TASK' or 'SCHEDULED_AUDIT_TASK'.

nested_items.name: taskStartTime
nested_items.description: The time the audit started.

nested_items.name: taskStatistics
nested_items.description: Statistical information about the audit.

nested_items.name: totalChecks
nested_items.description: The number of checks in this audit.

nested_items.name: inProgressChecks
nested_items.description: The number of checks in progress.

nested_items.name: waitingForDataCollectionChecks
nested_items.description: The number of checks waiting for data collection.

nested_items.name: compliantChecks
nested_items.description: The number of checks that found compliant resources.

nested_items.name: nonCompliantChecks
nested_items.description: The number of checks that found noncompliant resources.

nested_items.name: failedChecks
nested_items.description: The number of checks.

nested_items.name: canceledChecks
nested_items.description: The number of checks that did not run because the audit was canceled.

nested_items.name: scheduledAuditName
nested_items.description: The name of the scheduled audit (only if the audit was a scheduled audit).

nested_items.name: auditDetails
nested_items.description: Detailed information about each check performed during this audit.

nested_items.name: checkRunStatus
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: checkRunStatus
nested_items.description: The completion status of this check. One of 'IN_PROGRESS', 'WAITING_FOR_DATA_COLLECTION', 'CANCELED', 'COMPLETED_COMPLIANT', 'COMPLETED_NON_COMPLIANT', or 'FAILED'.

nested_items.name: checkCompliant
nested_items.description: True if the check is complete and found all resources compliant.

nested_items.name: totalResourcesCount
nested_items.description: The number of resources on which the check was performed.

nested_items.name: nonCompliantResourcesCount
nested_items.description: The number of resources that were found noncompliant during the check.

nested_items.name: suppressedNonCompliantResourcesCount
nested_items.description: Describes how many of the non-compliant resources created during the evaluation of an audit check were marked as suppressed.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The code of any error encountered when this check is performed during this audit. One of 'INSUFFICIENT_PERMISSIONS' or 'AUDIT_CHECK_DISABLED'.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: The message associated with any error encountered when this check is performed during this audit.
